summary: This document contains trial preparation notes for a witness, JA, dated November 11, 2021. It details JA's review of government exhibits (GX), procedures for managing Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house, receipt of employee rules from GM, and observations about nude photographs in the residence.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as JE. Owner of the Palm Beach house. JA describes procedures related to his arrivals and departures and mentions his desk.

connections.description: JA was an employee at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house, responsible for tasks like restocking food before his arrivals.
GM provided JA with a booklet containing rules for employees of the house, indicating a managerial or supervisory relationship.
GM is associated with Epstein's household operations, providing rulebooks to employees and being mentioned in the context of the residence.

events.title: Trial Preparation for Witness JA
events.description: Witness JA is prepared for trial testimony, reviewing government exhibits and recounting details about working at Epstein's Palm Beach house.

keyFacts: A witness (JA) prepared for trial testimony on November 11, 2021, reviewing specific government exhibits (GX-112, 113, 114, 327).
JA had a specific procedure of throwing out all food and restocking the fridge at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house every time Epstein left and was due to return.
JA received a booklet of rules for house employees from GM, which included rules about cleaning and interacting with guests.
GM told JA that an unnamed individual was learning to be a massage therapist.
JA recalls seeing nude photographs on GM's desk and possibly around Jeffrey Epstein's desk, but not in their respective bedrooms or bathrooms.
